name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-openai-summarise-page-content
title: Multilingual SharePoint Page Summarization with Open AI API and Microsoft Graph Pages API
shortDescription: This sample contains a SharePoint Framework web part and an Azure function that uses the Open AI API to summarize a SharePoint page in multiple languages.
longDescription: This sample contains a SharePoint Framework web part and an Azure function that uses the Open AI API to summarize a SharePoint page in multiple languages.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
